## RadioBrowserApi.getCountryCodes() method

Gets countries by country code

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCountryCodes(search?: string, query?: Query, fetchConfig?: RequestInit): Promise<CountryResult[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  search | string | Country code |
|  query | [Query](./radio-browser-api.query.md) | Query |
|  fetchConfig | RequestInit | Fetch configuration |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[CountryResult](./radio-browser-api.countryresult.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Array of country results with the name of the station and station count
